name: ts2civet
description: Converts typescript code to civet code

scripts.verify: civet ./build.civet --dev && node ./dist/cli.js --no-header ./verify/pre.tsx -o ./verify/emit.civet && civet -c ./verify/emit.civet -o ./verify/check.tsx && civet ./scripts/ts-ast.civet ./verify/pre.tsx ./verify/check.tsx && diff ./verify/pre.tsx.json ./verify/check.tsx.json > ./verify/ast-diff.json.diff && echo && echo Same AST!

author: esthedebeste
